import { useState } from "react"; import "./item.css"; import axios from "axios"; function ReasonPopUp(props) { const [reason, setReason] = useState(""); function SendRejectReason(event) { event.preventDefault(); let SID = props.companyData.SID; let Status_Sampling = 4; let Reject_Reason = reason; axios .post("http://localhost:4000/clickedItemUpdate", { SID: SID, Status_Sampling: Status_Sampling, Reject_Reason: Reject_Reason, }) .then(() => { alert("სტატუსი განახლებულია (სტატუსი 4)"); }); props.SetrejectPopUpRender(false); } console.log(reason); return (
{props.rejectPopUpRender && (

მონიშნეთ მიზეზი

setReason(e.target.value)} className="m-4" >
)}
); } export default ReasonPopUp;
